==== Auto Resizing ====

'''Tests to perform'''

** Try to move the slider to select a greater or lesser sized partition.
** Ensure that the other installation on the drive has been recognised correctly (For example WinXP will show up as the partition name for a drive with Xp on).
** Ensure on reboot that grub has correctly setup these partitions.
** Upon restart check both installations to be sure no damage is done to either.
